End
CodeBehindForm
Attribute VB_GlobalNameSpace = False
Attribute VB_Creatable = True
Attribute VB_PredeclaredId = True
Attribute VB_Exposed = False
'    SciFairMaster.mdb  (All class objects and modules)
'
'    Copyright (C) 2001,2002,2003,2004,2005,2006,2007,2008,2009,2010,2011,2012,2013,
'                  2014  Dennis e.Spanogle
'
'    This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
'    it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
'    the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
'    (at your option) any later version.
'
'    This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
'    but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
'    MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
'    GNU General Public License for more details.
'
'    You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
'    along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
'IMPORTANT NOTE: Exhibit Numbers are reserved and used as follows
' NUMBERED EXHIBITS, READY FOR FAIR 000101 to FairInfo.FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT - 1
' Practical limit = 9999 due to cards.  Limit to 32000 due to sfdata file
' EXHIBITS ADDED with Exhibits Edit,Add,Delete FairInfo.FIRST_ADD_EXHIIT to
' FiarInfo.First_ADD_EXHIBIT + 99,999
' TEMPORARY NUMBERS USED DURING RENUMBERING FairInfo.FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT + 100000
'  and higher
Option Compare Database
Option Explicit
Private HoldCRCState As Boolean ' current state of 'Confirm Record Change' option
Private TeachersRS As Recordset
Private StudentsRS As Recordset
Private FairInfoRS As Recordset
Private personsRS As Recordset
Private ExhibitStudentsRS As Recordset
Private ExhibitJudgesRS As Recordset
Private ExhibitDataRS As Recordset
Private JudgeTypeCategoriesRS As Recordset
Private dbSciFair As Database
Private criteria As String
Private msg As String
Private tempTP As String
Private Title As String
Private DidDelete As Boolean  ' Deleted an ExhibitData record
Private DeleteEXN As Long     ' Deleted Exhibit number
Private DidAdd As Boolean
Private TouchedUndo As Boolean
Private DeleteLast As Boolean
Private InAdd As Boolean
Private deleteSTID As Long    ' used to delete a student
Private DeletePID As Long     ' used to delete a person
Private NewPID As Long
Private NewSTID As Long
Private NewTID As Long
Private DoCrLf As Boolean
Private UserInitials As String
Private ctlPrevFocus As Control
Private FixedName As Boolean 'used with timer to clear messagebox re not in list
Private Stud2STID As Long
Private Stud3STID As Long
Private tS_FN As String  'save Me.S_FN for logging
Private tS_LN As String ' save  Me.S_LN for logging
Private TimerOption As Integer
Private DidGrade As Boolean     '  changed the grade box then this is set true
Private NCATChanged As Boolean


Private Sub ADDR1_AfterUpdate()
    Me.LAST_CHG = Format(Now, "mm/dd/yy")
End Sub
Private Sub btnAddStud_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  'MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnAddStud_Click()  ' -------------ADD A TEAM STUDENT ------------
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Dim NextStudent As Integer
  If Me.xExhibits_Edit__Student_2.Visible = False Then  ' Looks like add stud2
    If Me.xExhibits_Edit__Student_3.Visible = False Then
     NextStudent = 2
    Else  ' No Stud 2 but have Student 3 --- could happen if delete stud 2 only
      ' Hard to happen since Student 3 form covers btnAddStud
      'MsgBox "Next Time Delete Student 3 before Student 2"
      'Exit Sub
    End If
  Else  '   Student 2 is visible must be student 3 to add
    If Me.xExhibits_Edit__Student_3.Visible = True Then '  already have all
    On Error Resume Next
    ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
    Exit Sub
    Else
      NextStudent = 3
    End If
  End If
  If NextStudent = 2 Then  ' ------------------------ADD STUDENT 2 --------
   'Rev 5.4.0  Team Categories allowed OR a team project in a non-team category allowed
   'If InStr(1, Me.NCAT, "team") > 0 And Not IsNull(Me.FLOOR) _
   '         And Not IsNull(Me.SEX) Then
   ' Rev 540
   TeamEx = True   ' just set this here
   If (InStr(1, Me.NCAT, "team") > 0 Or TeamEx = True) And Not IsNull(Me.FLOOR) _
            And Not IsNull(Me.SEX) Then
     Me.xExhibits_Edit__Student_2.Visible = True
     Me.xExhibits_Edit__Student_2.SetFocus
     Me.xExhibits_Edit__Student_2!F_ORD = 2
     Me.xExhibits_Edit__Student_2!FYR = FairYear()
     Me.btnDelStud2.Visible = True
   Else
    ' Msg = "FIRST YOU MUST:" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
    '       "ENTER ALL OTHER EXHIBIT DATA" & vbCrLf & _
    '       " (Including SEX and FLOOR)" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
    '       "SELECT A 'TEAM' CATEGORY!"
     msg = "FIRST YOU MUST:" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
           "ENTER ALL OTHER EXHIBIT DATA" & vbCrLf & _
           " (Including SEX and FLOOR)" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
           "SELECT A 'TEAM' CATEGORY or check 'TeamExhibit'!"
     MsgBox msg, vbOKOnly, Title
    On Error Resume Next
    ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
    Exit Sub
   End If
  End If ' --- add Student 2
  If NextStudent = 3 Then  ' ------------------------ADD STUDENT 3 --------
   '  Rev 5.4.0
   'If InStr(1, Me.NCAT, "team") > 0 And Not IsNull(Me.FLOOR) _
   '         And Not IsNull(Me.SEX) Then
    TeamEx = True
    If (InStr(1, Me.NCAT, "team") > 0 Or Me.TeamEx = -1) And Not IsNull(Me.FLOOR) _
            And Not IsNull(Me.SEX) Then
    Me.xExhibits_Edit__Student_3.Visible = True
    Me.xExhibits_Edit__Student_3.SetFocus
    Me.xExhibits_Edit__Student_3!F_ORD = 3
    Me.xExhibits_Edit__Student_3!FYR = FairYear()
    Me.btnDelStud3.Visible = True
   Else
   '  Msg = "FIRST YOU MUST:" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
   '        "ENTER ALL OTHER EXHIBIT DATA" & vbCrLf & _
   '        " (Including SEX and FLOOR)" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
   '        "SELECT A 'TEAM' CATEGORY!"
     msg = "FIRST YOU MUST:" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
           "ENTER ALL OTHER EXHIBIT DATA" & vbCrLf & _
           " (Including SEX and FLOOR)" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
           "SELECT A 'TEAM' CATEGORY or check 'TeamExhibit'!"
     
     MsgBox msg, vbOKOnly, Title
     On Error Resume Next
     ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
     Exit Sub
   End If  ' is team NCAT
  End If ' --- add Student 3
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnDelStud2_Click()
   'delete the record in ExhibitStudents and make form and delbutton invisible
  Dim UnckTeam As Boolean
  On Error GoTo SubError
  ' Remove link in Exhibitstudent table
  UnckTeam = True
  With ExhibitStudentsRS
     .FindFirst "EXN = " & Me.EXN & " AND F_ORD = 2"
      deleteSTID = 0
      Stud2STID = !STID
      Stud3STID = 0
     Do While Not .NoMatch And Not .EOF ' should be only one this is just in case
        .Delete
        .FindNext "EXN = " & Me.EXN & " AND F_ORD = 2"
     Loop
     .FindFirst "EXN = " & Me.EXN & " AND F_ORD = 3"  ' see if a third student
     If Not .NoMatch Then
       'msg = "Change Student #3 to #2?"  ' ALWAYS DO THIS
       'If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton1, Title) = vbYes Then
        .Edit
        !F_ORD = 2  ' when requery will now still have a f_ord = 2
        .Update
        UnckTeam = False
       'End If
     End If
   .Requery
   If UnckTeam = True Then
      Me.TeamEx.Value = False
   End If
  End With
  Me.xExhibits_Edit__Student_2.Visible = False
  Me.cbStudent.SetFocus
  Me.btnDelStud2.Visible = False
  
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Call btnSave_Click
  Call DeleteStud
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnDelStud3_Click()
   'delete the record in ExhibitStudents and make form and delbutton invisible
  On Error GoTo SubError
  With ExhibitStudentsRS
     .FindFirst "EXN = " & Me.EXN & " AND F_ORD = 3"
      deleteSTID = 0
      Stud2STID = 0
      Stud3STID = !STID
      Do While Not .NoMatch And Not .EOF
        .Delete
        .FindNext "EXN = " & Me.EXN & " AND F_ORD = 3"
     Loop
     .Requery
  End With
  Me.xExhibits_Edit__Student_3.Visible = False
  Me.cbStudent.SetFocus
  Me.btnDelStud3.Visible = False
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Call btnSave_Click
  Call DeleteStud
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnUndo_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnUndo_Click
   If IsNull(Me.EXN) And IsNull(Me.cbStudent) Then
     DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acPrevious
     Exit Sub
   End If
   DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acEditMenu, acUndo, , acMenuVer70
Exit_btnUndo_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnUndo_Click:
    Dim errnum As Long
    errnum = Err.Number
    If Err.Number = 2046 Or Err.Number = 2009 Then  ' command undo not available
      Exit Sub
    End If
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnUndo_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnUndo_MouseMove(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Single, Y As Single)
   TouchedUndo = True
End Sub

Private Sub cbJCAT_Exit(Cancel As Integer)
  Dim oldNCAT As String
  On Error GoTo SubError
  oldNCAT = IIf(IsNull(Me.NCAT), "", Me.NCAT)  ' rev 5.3.1
  If IsNull(Me.JCAT) Then
    Me.NCAT = Null
    Exit Sub
  End If
  With JudgeTypeCategoriesRS
   .FindFirst "JCAT = """ & Me.JCAT & """"
   Me.NCAT = !NCAT
  End With
  If Me.NCAT <> oldNCAT Then
    NCATChanged = True
   End If
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbSchool_Enter()
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub city_AfterUpdate()
  If Len(Me.CITY) > 2 Then
    If Mid(Me.CITY, 1, 3) = "alb" And Len(Me.CITY) < 5 Then
      Me.CITY = "Albuquerque"
    End If
  End If
  Me.CITY = UCase(Mid(Me.CITY, 1, 1)) & Mid(Me.CITY, 2, Len(Me.CITY) - 1)
  If InStr(1, Me.CITY, "Albuquerque") > 0 Then
    Dim ne As Boolean
    Dim se As Boolean
    Dim nw As Boolean
    Dim sw As Boolean
    If InStr(1, Me.ADDR1, "NE") Or InStr(1, Me.ADDR2, "NE") Then ne = True
    If InStr(1, Me.ADDR1, "SE") Or InStr(1, Me.ADDR2, "SE") Then se = True
    If InStr(1, Me.ADDR1, "NW") Or InStr(1, Me.ADDR2, "NW") Then nw = True
    If InStr(1, Me.ADDR1, "SW") Or InStr(1, Me.ADDR2, "SW") Then sw = True
    If InStr(1, Me.ADDR1, "N.E.") Or InStr(1, Me.ADDR2, "N.E.") Then ne = True
    If InStr(1, Me.ADDR1, "S.E.") Or InStr(1, Me.ADDR2, "S.E.") Then se = True
    If InStr(1, Me.ADDR1, "N.W.") Or InStr(1, Me.ADDR2, "N.W.") Then nw = True
    If InStr(1, Me.ADDR1, "S.W.") Or InStr(1, Me.ADDR2, "S.W.") Then sw = True
    If ne Or se Or nw Or sw Then
      Exit Sub
    Else
      MsgBox "Enter Quadrant in Address (NE, SE, NW, SW)"
    End If
  End If
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub

Private Sub EMAIL_AfterUpdate()
    On Error GoTo SubError
    Me.LAST_CHG = Format(Now, "mm/dd/yy")
    Exit Sub
SubError:
    MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub EXHB_TITLE_Exit(Cancel As Integer)
  Dim loc As Integer
  On Error GoTo SubError
  If Not IsNull(Me.EXHB_TITLE) Then
   loc = InStr(1, Me.EXHB_TITLE, Chr(13))
   If loc > 0 Then
    MsgBox "Last Field? Did you Press [Ctrl]+[Enter]?" & vbCrLf & _
    "chr" & loc & ": " & Asc(Mid(Me.EXHB_TITLE, loc, 1)) & vbCrLf & _
    "chr" & loc + 1 & ": " & Asc(Mid(Me.EXHB_TITLE, loc + 1, 1)) & vbCrLf & _
    "chr" & loc + 2 & ": " & Asc(Mid(Me.EXHB_TITLE, loc + 2, 1)) & vbCrLf & _
    "Clear entire field with  <-- (backspace key) then re-enter)", , Title
   End If
  End If
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub EXN_AfterUpdate()
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Dim SvEXN As Long
  SvEXN = Me.EXN
  ' Check that next EXN in FairInfo is greater than the EXN just entered
  Set dbSciFair = CurrentDb()
  Set FairInfoRS = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset("FairInfo", dbOpenDynaset)
  With FairInfoRS
    .FindFirst "FAIR_YEAR = " & FairYear()
    If .NoMatch Then
         MsgBox "Table FairInfo must have an entry for year " & FairYear() _
         & vbCrLf & "Enter Exhibit number, save, then go fix FairInfo", , Title
    Else
       If IsNull(!FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT) Then
          MsgBox "Table FairInfo must have a number (eg 100001) in" & vbCrLf & _
          "the FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT field. Click 'Undo to abort this entry" & vbCrLf & _
          "and place a number (100001 is suggested) in that field for" & vbCrLf & _
          "the record for fair year " & FairYear(), , Title
          Exit Sub
       End If
       If IsNull(!NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT) Then
          .Edit
          !NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT = !FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT
          .Update
       End If
       If !NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT < !FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT Or _
          !NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT > !FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT + 99999 Then
          .Edit
          !NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT = !FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT
          .Update
       End If
       If SvEXN > !NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT Then
          .Edit   ' go to edit mode to lock record
          !NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT = SvEXN + 1
          .Update
       End If
    End If
  End With
  DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acRecordsMenu, acSaveRecord, , acMenuVer70
  Dim rs As Object
  Set rs = Me.Recordset.Clone
  rs.FindFirst "[ES_EXN] = " & SvEXN
  Me.Bookmark = rs.Bookmark
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub EXN_Enter()
  On Error GoTo SubError
  ' If change the EXN, Cascade update changes ExhibitStudents EXN but.. the
  ' subforms do not show previous students.  Need to relink the subforms
  ' or something?  for now I will not allow in this form
  msg = "Please Do Not Change EXN (Staff Use Only)!" & vbCrLf & _
       "To complete change, click 'Save Record' on next message" & vbCrLf & _
       "If you create a duplicate, clear error messages then PRESS [Esc]"
  MsgBox msg, , Title
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub




Private Sub Form_BeforeUpdate(Cancel As Integer)
  Dim Exnum As Long
  Dim ii As Long
  On Error GoTo SubError
  If Me.EXN > 100 Then
    ' rev 540
    If Me.xExhibits_Edit__Student_2.Visible = True Then
        If Me.TeamEx.Value = False Then
           MsgBox "You Must check Team if more than one student."
           Cancel = True
        End If
    Else    ' no student 2
        If Me.TeamEx.Value = True Then
           MsgBox "You Must Un-Check Team if Only One Student."
           Cancel = True
        End If
    End If
    If IsNull(Me.STID) Or IsNull(Me.S_PID) Then  '  Do not exit if no person
      MsgBox "You Must Enter a Student!", , Title
      Cancel = True
    End If
    If IsNull(Me.FLOOR) Then
      MsgBox "FLOOR must be 'Y' (Floor) or 'N' Normal table", , Title
      Cancel = True
    End If
    If IsNull(Me.NCAT) Then
      MsgBox "JCAT must be Entered!", , Title
      Cancel = True
    End If
    If IsNull(Me.SEX) Then
      MsgBox "SEX must be Entered!", , Title
      Cancel = True
    End If
  End If
  If DidGrade = True Then
       DidGrade = False
  Else   '     Did not change the grade - must change even to same value
       MsgBox "Change or Re-enter the Grade! (Student 1)"
       Cancel = True
  End If
  
  '  Rev 5.2.4   if judges have been assigned then must do this
  If NCATChanged = True Then
    NCATChanged = False
    Dim Titleloc As String
    Titleloc = "Judges Are Assigned"
    Set ExhibitJudgesRS = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset _
                                      ("ExhibitJudges", dbOpenDynaset) ' Rev 5.2.4 see if judges assigned
     With ExhibitJudgesRS
      .FindFirst "EXN = " & EXN
      If Not .NoMatch Or Me.NUMJUDGES > 0 Then
        msg = "Exhibit " & EXN & " has Assigned Judges!" & vbCrLf & _
              "Remove Judge Assignments (So you can RE-ASSIGN Later)?"
        If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo, Titleloc) = vbYes Then
          ' remove judge info from the exhibitsdata table.
           Me.J_1 = Null
           Me.J_2 = Null
           Me.J_3 = Null
           Me.J_4 = Null
           Me.NUMJUDGES = 0
           ' remove all records  for this EXN in ExhibitJudges table.
          If Not .NoMatch Then  ' check again in case just had NUMJUDGES > 0
            .Delete   ' deletes the first found record
          End If
          Do While Not .EOF
            .FindNext "EXN = " & EXN
            If Not .NoMatch Then
              .Delete
            Else
              Exit Do
            End If
          Loop
        End If
        'If MsgBox("Do you want to renumber this exhibit to the " & vbCrLf & _
        '       "First Available Exhbit number in the new category?", vbYesNo, Titleloc) = vbYes Then
        MsgBox "IF you have Assigned Judges, You Must Renumber this Exhibit" & vbCrLf & _
               " Into the NEW category and then Assign Judges to New Exhibits" & vbCrLf & _
               "You will Verify/Enter the NEW Exhibit number in the next step."
         Dim Inex As Integer
         Dim Inexst As String
         Dim EDRS As Recordset
         Dim PNewExn As Integer
         ' rev 5.3.7  see if can find the next exhibit number in the new category
         Set EDRS = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset("SELECT [EXN], [NCAT] from [Exhibitdata]" & _
            " WHERE [NCAT] = '" & Me.NCAT & "' ORDER BY [EXN]", dbOpenSnapshot, dbReadOnly)
         EDRS.MoveLast
         PNewExn = EDRS!EXN + 1
         EDRS.Close
InAgain:
         Inexst = InputBox("Verify/Enter the New Exhibit Number (Next Available Number in NEW CATEGORY)" & vbCrLf & _
                           "After you Click Enter - You will need to Click [Yes] to the warning " & _
                           "message about the record being changed by another user.", Titleloc, PNewExn)
         If IsNull(Inexst) Or Len(Inexst) = 0 Or Inexst = "0" Then
           If MsgBox("Do you want to Stop trying to Re-Number?", vbYesNo, Titleloc) = vbYes Then
              MsgBox "You must Still Renumber the exhibit and Re-assign Judges!", vbOKOnly, Titleloc
              GoTo SkipExnRn
           Else
              GoTo InAgain
           End If
         End If
         Dim i As Integer
         For i = 1 To Len(Inexst)
            ' check
            Inex = Asc(Mid(Inexst, i, 1))
            If Asc(Mid(Inexst, i, 1)) < 48 Or Asc(Mid(Inexst, i, 1)) > 57 Then
              GoTo InAgain
            End If
         Next
         On Error GoTo InAgain   ' this seems to only work for the first error.  Not sure why
         Inex = Inexst   ' will give an error if not a number or bigger than an integer or..
         ' rev 5.3.7   at this point have a good integer.  see if the exn is available
         ' in case operator decided to overide the one found above
         Set EDRS = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset("SELECT [EXN], [NCAT] from [Exhibitdata]", dbOpenSnapshot, dbReadOnly)
         EDRS.FindFirst ("[EXN] = " & Inex)
         If Not EDRS.NoMatch Then '   found it so can not change to existing exhibit number
            MsgBox "That Exhibit number is already used.  Try again"
            GoTo InAgain
         End If
         EDRS.Close
         On Error GoTo SubError
         Me.EXN = Inex
SkipExnRn:
      End If  ' had judges assigned and changed category
      .Close
     End With
  End If
 '   end rev 5.2.4 changes
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox "Error in Form.BeforeUpdate " & Err.Description
End Sub


Private Sub Form_Current()  'each time a new record is sellected
   On Error GoTo SubError
   TouchedUndo = False
   If Me.NewRecord Then ' Or IsNull(Me.PROTOID) Then
      DidGrade = False  'Always must enter/edit grade in new record
      cbStudent.Locked = False ' Allow new student entry
      Me.tbRecord = 1 + Me.Recordset.RecordCount
      Me.tbNumRec = 1 + Me.Recordset.RecordCount
      DidAdd = True
      InAdd = True
   Else
      DidGrade = True ' Assume OK unless change student which sets False
      DeleteLast = False
      Me.cbFindStudent.Requery
      Me.tbNumRec = Me.Recordset.RecordCount
      Me.tbRecord = Me.CurrentRecord
      cbStudent.Locked = False           ' CHANGE this to TRUE to lock Edits
     ' Fill in other student fields if exist
      GetOtherStudentData (2)
      GetOtherStudentData (3)
      InAdd = False
   End If
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox "FrmCurrent " & Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub GetOtherStudentData(studnum As Integer)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  With ExhibitStudentsRS
     .Requery   ' Be sure any new entries in table are now in recordset
    ' See if record for this Exhibit and for student 2 or 3
    .FindFirst "EXN = " & Me.EXN & " AND F_ORD = " & studnum
    If .NoMatch Then  ' hide form
      Select Case studnum
        Case 2
         Me.xExhibits_Edit__Student_2.Visible = False
         Me.btnDelStud2.Visible = False
        Case 3
         Me.xExhibits_Edit__Student_3.Visible = False
         Me.btnDelStud3.Visible = False
      End Select
    Else     ' unhide subform
      Select Case studnum
        Case 2
         Me.xExhibits_Edit__Student_2.Visible = True
         Me.btnDelStud2.Visible = True
        Case 3
         Me.xExhibits_Edit__Student_3.Visible = True
         Me.btnDelStud3.Visible = True
      End Select
    End If
  End With
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbFindStudent_Enter()
   On Error GoTo SubError
   If DidDelete = True Then
     Me.cbFindStudent.Requery
     DidDelete = False
   End If
   If DidAdd = True Then
     Me.cbFindStudent.Requery
     DidAdd = False
   End If
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbFindStudent_AfterUpdate()
  Dim rs As Object
  On Error GoTo SubError
  If (IsNull(cbFindStudent)) Then
     'MsgBox "Nothing Selected!"
     'cbFindStudent.SetFocus
     Exit Sub
  End If
  
  'Nextline (vs setrs,me.bookmark=rs.bookmark) allows updates in Form.BeforeUpdate
  Me.Recordset.FindFirst "F_ORD = 1 AND ES_EXN = " & Format(Me![cbFindStudent]) & " "
  'Set rs = Me.Recordset.Clone
  'rs.FindFirst "[ES_STID] = " & Format(Me![cbFindStudent]) & " "
  'Me.Bookmark = rs.Bookmark
  'Me.cbEXN = Null
  Me.cbFindStudent = Null
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Timer()
  On Error GoTo SubError
  'SendKeys Chr(27) & Chr$(27)  ' vbKeyEscape = 27  So why does this not work?
  ' Discovered why vbESC, Chr(27) etc do not work. Since they are
  ' non printing characters, they must be enclosed in brackets
  ' i.e.  SendKeys {vbKeyEscape}  etc.  Note addere rev 1.0.8
  Me.TimerInterval = 0     ' Stop timer so only do this once!
  If TimerOption = 1 Then
   If DoCrLf = True Then  '   just move from the Student or Teacher box
    
    SendKeys "{TAB}"  '' {ENTER}   was  vbCrLf causes crlf in next field BAD!!!
    DoCrLf = False
    FixedName = False ' can come here if this is true so clear
    Call SetEXN   ' will set exn if not already set. This is normally set in
      'cbstudent_afterupdate but in all cases where the timer is called from
      'from cbstudent_NotInList, AfterUpdate routine is not called - so I set it here.
   End If
  End If
  If TimerOption = 2 Then
    'Need to reset the Schoold Or Teacher CB after a change??
    If Not IsNull(Me.cbSchool) Then Me.cbSchool.Value = Me.SCH_CODE
    If Not IsNull(Me.cbTeacher) Then Me.cbTeacher.Value = Me.TID
  End If
  If TimerOption = 3 Then  '  -------------- Do TWO UNDO commands
     DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acEditMenu, acUndo, , acMenuVer70
     TimerOption = 4
     Me.TimerInterval = 100
  End If
  If TimerOption = 4 Then  ' ----------- Do ONE UNDO command
      DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acEditMenu, acUndo, , acMenuVer70
  End If
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  Dim errnum As Long
  errnum = Err.Number
  If Err.Number = 2046 Or Err.Number = 2009 Then  ' command undo not available
     Exit Sub
  End If
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbSchool_BeforeUpdate(Cancel As Integer)
   On Error GoTo SubError
   If Not Me.NewRecord Then
     ' I have no idea why the combo box does not reset it's display to
     ' the origional selected item. It does in protocols.  In protocols the
     ' bound item is in the 'primary top level table'. Here it is not
     ' perhaps that is the reason!  anyway had to add hint as workaround.
     ' Notice the rest of the form data is reset, just not the selection!
     ' Now... Added Form.timer work around
     'msg = "HINT: Press [Esc] once to restore)" & vbCrLf &
     msg = "Do you Really Want to " & vbCrLf & _
           "CHANGE THE SCHOOL?"
     If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title) = vbNo Then
        'Me.SCH_CODE = Me.cbSchool.OldValue
        Cancel = True
        'TimerOption = 2
        TimerOption = 4  ' Do ONE UNDO
        Form.TimerInterval = 100 '10 ms gives time for Cancel=true code to work
     End If
   End If
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbEXN_AfterUpdate()
    ' Find the record that matches the control.
   On Error GoTo SubError
    Dim rs As Object
    If (IsNull(cbEXN)) Then
       'MsgBox "Nothing Selected!"
       'cbEXN.SetFocus
       Exit Sub
    End If
    Me.Recordset.FindFirst "F_ORD = 1 AND [ES_EXN] = " & Str(Me![cbEXN])
    'Set rs = Me.Recordset.Clone
    'rs.FindFirst "[ES_EXN] = " & str(Me![cbEXN])
    'Me.Bookmark = rs.Bookmark
    Me.cbEXN = Null
    'Me.cbFindStudent = Null
Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbEXN_Enter()
   On Error GoTo SubError
   If DidDelete = True Then
     Me.cbEXN.Requery
     DidDelete = False
   End If
   If DidAdd = True Then
     Me.cbEXN.Requery
     DidAdd = False
   End If
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbStudent_AfterUpdate()
   On Error GoTo SubError
     Call SetEXN   ' will set exn if not already set.
          ' but this routine not called  in some cases
         ' i.e. when exit cbStudent_notinlist' with Response = acDataErrContinue
         ' in that case form_timer is used, so... I will set exn there also
     DidGrade = False  '  Selected a new student - Assume Old data for grade
                        ' so assume no change to grade yet
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbStudent_Exit(Cancel As Integer)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  If IsNull(cbStudent.Value) And IsNull(Me.EXN) And TouchedUndo = False Then
     TouchedUndo = False
     If DeleteLast = False Then
       msg = "ABORT 'Add Exhibit' Entry?"
       If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton1, Title) = vbYes Then
         Exit Sub
       Else
         msg = "Unless you are exiting the form, " & vbCrLf & _
         " You MUST enter student's name FIRST!" & vbCrLf & _
         " Failure to do so will cause many problems including:" & vbCrLf & _
         " corrupt data, free candy bar if you read this, program errors," & vbCrLf & _
         " upset staff, crashed computers, un-ending loops and ..." & vbCrLf & _
         " REPEAT of this nasty message! " & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
         " DO NOT ENTER DATA ELSEWHERE IN THE FORM!" & vbCrLf & _
         " GO BACK AND ENTER Student NOW! "
          MsgBox msg, , Title
        End If
     End If
     DeleteLast = False
  End If
  If TouchedUndo = True And IsNull(Me.cbStudent.Value) And IsNull(Me.EXN) Then
     ' do not try to set Exn - there is an attempt to undo an add
  Else
  
    ' Call SetEXN   ' will set exn if not already set and beforeupdate not called
         ' i.e. when exit notinlist with Response = acDataErrContinue
  End If
  Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbStudent_BeforeUpdate(Cancel As Integer)
  'NOTE IMPORTANT:  This routine (or AfterUpdate)
  '  is NOT CALLED if the student entry  was:
  ' 1. not in the list box and
  ' 2. I exit 'notinlist with Response = acDataErrContinue
  ' 3. exit of box is forced using my timer routines
  Dim rs As Object
  Dim rs1 As Recordset
  On Error GoTo SubError
  ' See if the 'EXISTING' (i.e. a normal combo box selection in the list)
  ' student selected is already in the Student Table.
  TouchedUndo = False
  ' cbstudent.value will not normally be null but... just in case user clears field or?
  If IsNull(cbStudent.Value) Then
     MsgBox "Please Select or Enter Student's Name", , Title
     Cancel = True
     Exit Sub
  End If
  '  Check if student change - if so give warnings - Normally should abort -----
  '  EXN has been set! Note if enter a 'new student, before update is not called
  ' (per above discussion) but that is OK, New student can not already be assigend.
  If Not IsNull(Me.EXN) Then 'And Me.EXN < FairInfoRS!FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT Then
    If cbStudent.OldValue = cbStudent.Value Then ' added 07/14/02 Bug fix
      Cancel = True
      TimerOption = 3 ' send two undos reset record  user just selected the same person
      MsgBox "Selected Same Person!" & vbCrLf & _
             "ALL FORM CHANGES WILL BE RESET!" & vbCrLf & _
             "Re-enter changes (if any)."
      Me.TimerInterval = 50   ' send it in 50 ms
      Exit Sub
    Else '   Seems we are selecting a different student
      msg = "WAIT! Student Change Exhibit " & Me.EXN & vbCrLf & _
       "Normally you should NOT 'change' the student!" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
       "TO CHANGE SPELLING Use 'Persons Edit' in SciFairMaster" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
       "CHANGE STUDENT? "
      If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title) = vbNo Then
        Cancel = True
        TimerOption = 4  '       ------------ SEND ONE UNDO ------------------
        Me.TimerInterval = 50
        Exit Sub
      End If
    End If
  End If
  ' Check if This student already in the Exhibitstudents Recordset ----------
  Set rs = Me.Recordset.Clone
  rs.FindFirst "[ES_STID] = " & cbStudent.Value
  If rs.NoMatch Then  ' this is not a duplicate -- THIS is a new student -
   With StudentsRS    ' Reset the TP in Persons if currently PS (Protocol Stud)
    .FindFirst "STID = " & Me.cbStudent.Value
    If Not .NoMatch Then
      ' set Temp to user+date
      .Edit
      !Temp = UserInitials & Format(Now, "mm/yy")   ' <----- STUDENT TEMP
      tempTP = IIf(IsNull(!TP), "", !TP) ' get the current TP of the selected person
      If InStr(1, tempTP, "PS") > 0 Then  ' Change PS to ES
        Mid(tempTP, InStr(1, tempTP, "PS"), 2) = "ES"
        !TP = tempTP
      End If
      !LAST_FAIR = FairYear
      .Update
    End If
   End With
  Else   ' have a match  this STID is already in Exhibits  so do warning ------
         ' AND EXIT - do not set EXN
    Dim ExWithStud As Long
    ExWithStud = rs.ES_EXN
    ' At this point, there is a record formed for ExhibitStudents - It has this
    ' Student and has the default F_ORD ( of '0' ) I will set F_ORD so
    ' it does not confuse the user. Also, because there are some conditions
    ' (User keeps trying finally forcing anything in student..)
    ' that will enter the exisiting record. The Cancel = True cancels the record
    Me.F_ORD = 1
    msg = "STUDENT ALREADY ENTERED (Exhibit " & ExWithStud & ")" & vbCrLf & _
      vbCrLf & "ALL FORM CHANGES WILL BE RESET!" & vbCrLf & _
      "Select a different student" & vbCrLf & _
      "and Re-enter other changes (if any)."
    MsgBox msg
    TimerOption = 3 '    ----  -----  DO TWO UNDO Commands -----------------
    Me.TimerInterval = 100
    Cancel = True
    Exit Sub
  End If
 ' Student Stuff is now set up as good as can be so see if new exhibit
  Call SetEXN
  ' Done with EXN SETUP --------------------------------------------------------
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub SetEXN()
   ' NEW EXHIBIT,  Set up the ExhibitData and ExhibitStudents records
   ' Get the EXN from FairInfo Table Field NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT
   ' THis locks the record so prevents others getting same EXN
  On Error GoTo SubError
  If IsNull(Me.EXN) Or Me.EXN = 0 Then  '  No exn assigned must be new
     Me.F_ORD = 1   '   This is always the first student.
     Me.ES_FYR = FairYear()
     Me.E_FYR = FairYear()
     If IsNull(Me.ENTRY_DATE) Then
       Me.ENTRY_DATE = Format(Now, "mm/dd/yy")
     End If
     Set dbSciFair = CurrentDb()
     Set FairInfoRS = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset("FairInfo", dbOpenDynaset)
'                       , dbPessimistic) ' locks the record on .edit
     With FairInfoRS
       .FindFirst "FAIR_YEAR = " & FairYear()
       If .NoMatch Then
         MsgBox "Table FairInfo must have an entry for year " & FairYear() _
         & vbCrLf & "Enter Exhibit number, save, then go fix FairInfo", , Title
       Else
        If IsNull(!FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT) Then
          MsgBox "Table FairInfo must have a number (eg 100000) in" & vbCrLf & _
          "the FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT field. Click 'Undo to abort this entry" & vbCrLf & _
          "and place a number (100000 is suggested) in that field for" & vbCrLf & _
          "the record for fair year " & FairYear(), , Title
          Exit Sub
        End If
        If IsNull(!NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT) Then
          .Edit
          !NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT = !FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT
          .Update
        End If
        If !NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT < !FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT Or _
           !NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT > !FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT + 99999 Then
          .Edit
          !NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT = !FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT
          .Update
        End If
        .Edit   ' go to edit mode to lock record
        Me.EXN = !NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT '  Due to Cascade UPdate this
                                   '  ALSO Sets me.ES_EXN
        !NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT = !NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT + 1
        If !NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT > !NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT + 99999 Then
          MsgBox "Next Exhibit Add Exceeds Maximum allowed EXN!" & vbCrLf & _
          "Stop ALL Exhibits Entry, Fix problem. Do Exhibit Renumber and/or" & vbCrLf & _
          "check the value of FairInfo.FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT", , Title
        End If
        .Update
       End If
     End With
  End If
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbStudent_NotInList(newdata As String, Response As Integer)
   ' IMPORTANT NOTE:  IT is possible to get to 'not in list' in certain
   ' situations when the real name has not changed. I.E. when the user
   ' simply back spaces to remove the (ES) (Persons.ty) from the name
   ' and tabs or selects another field.  The user sometimes wants to clean
   ' up the name by removing the Persons.ty  S_TP
   ' new code below 07/14/02 attempts to skip this case
   On Error GoTo SubError
   Dim Name As String
   Dim ln As String
   Dim FN As String
   Dim min As String
   Dim SAL As String
   Dim rtn As Boolean
   Name = newdata   'lastname, firstname, mi, salutation'
   rtn = ParseName(Name, ln, FN, min, SAL, FixedName)
   If rtn = False Then      ' did not parse so exit  error message already done
       'MsgBox "Bad Name, ReEnter!"
       Response = acDataErrContinue
       Exit Sub
   Else  ' have names so see if same name or if need create a new record
     ' see if this is the same PID as the current selection
     ' NEW CODE  07/14/02
      msg = "LNAME = """ & ln & """ AND " & _
         "FNAME " & IIf(FN = "", "is null ", "= """ & FN & """") & " AND " & _
         "MI " & IIf(min = "", "is null ", "= """ & min & """") & " AND " & _
         "SALUTATION " & IIf(SAL = "", "is null ", "= """ & SAL & """")
      With StudentsRS
        'Rev 5.5.4  554 DES   Do not movefirst if EOF
        If Not .EOF Then
          .MoveFirst
        End If
        Do While Not .EOF
           .FindNext msg
           If Not .NoMatch Then
             If !STID = cbStudent.Value Then
               ' same student as current so not even ask if add
               Response = acDataErrContinue
               TimerOption = 4 ' do One Undo
               Me.TimerInterval = 50  ' in 50 ms do an ESC
               Exit Sub
             End If
           Else  ' no match so is a new unique name
              Exit Do
           End If
        Loop
      End With
     msg = SAL & " " & FN & " " & min & " " & ln & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
           "ENTER NEW STUDENT?"
     If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo, Title) = vbYes Then
       ' returns false if error, else true with NewPid = 0 if no dups, else pid
       ' of selected person to use instead of the the one typed
       If SearchDuplicatePersons(ln, FN, min, SAL, "Students", NewPID) = False Then
         Response = acDataErrContinue
         Exit Sub
       End If
       With StudentsRS
          .AddNew           ' entering a student record
          If NewPID = 0 Then
            ' No Duplicates or user indicated to use his/her Input
            'Entering data in these fields creates new PID
                            ' and puts it in Student.PID field
            DidGrade = False '  Assume did not update the grade for New Student
            !LNAME = IIf(ln = "", Null, ln)
            !FNAME = IIf(FN = "", Null, FN)
            !MI = IIf(min = "", Null, min)
            !SALUTATION = IIf(SAL = "", Null, SAL)
            !TP = "ES"   ' Exhibit student
            ' next entry is actually in Students table so sets STID
            ' it is required to put something in table to set STID
            !Temp = "t"  ' <----- STUDENT TEMP  it is reentered below
             NewSTID = !STID
            .Update   ' ---------------------------- ADD NEW STUDENT RECORD
          Else
            ' User choose an existing student
            DidGrade = False '  Assume did not update Grade yet
            !PID = NewPID  ' this just links in the selected Person
                           ' to the new student record thus avoiding dups
                           ' and fills in LNAME, FNAME, TP, LAST_CHG etc.
            NewSTID = !STID
            .Update   ' ---------------------------- ADD NEW STUDENT RECORD
            .MoveFirst    ' go to the new record!
            .FindFirst "STID = " & NewSTID
            .Edit
            tempTP = IIf(IsNull(!TP), "", !TP)
            Call setFieldTP(tempTP, "ES")      ' Add "ES" to the TP field
            !TP = tempTP
            .Update
          End If
          .MoveFirst    ' go to the new record!
          .FindFirst "STID = " & NewSTID
          .Edit
          !Temp = UserInitials & Format(Now, "mm/yy")   ' <----- STUDENT TEMP
          !LAST_CHG = Format(Now, "mm/dd/yy")     ' < ----- Persons LAST_CHG --
          !LAST_FAIR = FairYear
          .Update
          
          Me.cbStudent.Value = !STID
       End With
       Me.cbStudent.Requery
       If (NewPID = 0 And InStr(1, newdata, ";") <= 0) _
              And FixedName = False Then  'added 011202 to handle auto periods
         Response = acDataErrAdded
       Else ' HERE IF FixedName = True or newpid > 0 OR ; in strings
          ' If I set Response = acDataErrAdded in this case, (forced a new record)
          ' combobox .value and me.STID(or TID etc) are reset to the value
          ' that was selected in the combobox prior to me forcing a new STID or TID.
          ' I think the acdataerrAdded puts this in there before it trys to
          ' exit the box..
          ' by settin Response = acDataErrContinue the new record is added,
          ' the correct record is selected in the combo box and the user just
          ' has to press enter or tab again or click somewhere else.
          ' perhaps the is a way to do this better but I know not how. This took two
          ' days (now at 3 days) to figure out!
          ' New data 011202. In the case as described here and with my timer proces
          ' of sending crlf to move on. the combobox_BeforeUpdate and
          ' combobox_AfterUpdate routines are  NOT CALLED.
          ' So  ... must take care of important stuff in combobox_exit
          ' or other places! example I call SetEXN in both form_timer and
          ' cbstudent_afterupdate
         Response = acDataErrContinue
         DoCrLf = True
         TimerOption = 1  ' do crlf
         Me.TimerInterval = 50  ' in 50 milliseconds do a crlf for the user
       End If
     Else  ' abort the process, user abort
       Response = acDataErrContinue
       TimerOption = 4 ' do One Undo   (fix bug of adding duplicate students)
                       ' 07/14/02
       Me.TimerInterval = 50  ' in 50 ms do an ESC
       Exit Sub
     End If  ' user response to add record
   End If 'parsename rtn check
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbTeacher_BeforeUpdate(Cancel As Integer)
   On Error GoTo SubError
   With TeachersRS
    .FindFirst "TID = " & Me.cbTeacher.Value
    If Not .NoMatch Then
      tempTP = !TP   ' get the current TP of the selected person
      If InStr(1, tempTP, "PT") > 0 Then  ' Change PT to ET
        Mid(tempTP, InStr(1, tempTP, "PT"), 2) = "ET"
        .Edit
        !TP = tempTP
        .Update
      End If
    End If
   End With
   If Not Me.NewRecord Then
     ' I have no idea why the combo box does not reset it's display to
     ' the origional selected item. It does in protocols.  In protocols the
     ' bound item is in the 'primary top level table'. Here it is not
     ' perhaps that is the reason!  anyway had to add hint as workaround.
     ' Notice the rest of the form data is reset, just not the selection!
     ' Now... Added Form.timer work around
     'msg = "HINT: Press [Esc] once to restore)" & vbCrLf &
     msg = "Do you Really Want to " & vbCrLf & _
           "CHANGE THE TEACHER?"
     If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title) = vbNo Then
       'Me.E_TID = cbTeacher.OldValue
       Cancel = True
       'TimerOption = 2
       TimerOption = 4  ' do ONE UNDO
       Me.TimerInterval = 100 ' 10 ms gives time for Cancel=true code to work
     End If
   End If
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbTeacher_Enter()
  On Error GoTo SubError
  If IsNull(Me.SCH_CODE) Then
    MsgBox "Enter School First", vbOKOnly, Title
  End If
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbTeacher_NotInList(newdata As String, Response As Integer)
   On Error GoTo SubError
   Dim Name As String
   Dim ln As String
   Dim FN As String
   Dim min As String
   Dim SAL As String
   Dim rtn As Boolean
   Name = newdata   'lastname, firstname, mi, salutation'
   rtn = ParseName(Name, ln, FN, min, SAL, FixedName)
   If rtn = False Then      ' did not parse so exit. error message done already
       'MsgBox "Bad Name, ReEnter!"
       Response = acDataErrContinue
       Exit Sub
   Else  ' have names so create a new record
     Beep
           '"LN = " & LN & vbCrLf & _
           '"FN = " & FN & vbCrLf & _
           '"MI  = " & min & vbCrLf & _
           '"SAL = " & SAL & vbCrLf & _'
     msg = "WAIT: ASK STAFF Before Entering a NEW TEACHER!" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
           SAL & " " & FN & " " & min & " " & ln & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
           "ENTER A NEW TEACHER?"
     If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title) = vbYes Then
       If SearchDuplicatePersons(ln, FN, min, SAL, "Teachers", NewPID) = False Then
         Response = acDataErrContinue
         Exit Sub
       End If
       With TeachersRS
          .AddNew           ' entering a student record
          If NewPID = 0 Then 'Entering data in these fields creates new PID
                            ' and puts it in Teacher.PID field
            !LNAME = IIf(ln = "", Null, ln)
            !FNAME = IIf(FN = "", Null, FN)
            !MI = IIf(min = "", Null, min)
            !SALUTATION = IIf(SAL = "", Null, SAL)
            !TP = "ET"   ' Exhibit Teacher  ADDED (NOT IN TEACHER LIST)
            ' next entry is actually in Students table so sets STID
            ' it is required to put something in table to set STID
            !Temp = "t"  ' <----- Teacher TEMP
             NewTID = !TID
            .Update   ' ---------------------------- ADD NEW TEACHER RECORD
          Else
            !PID = NewPID  ' this just links in the selected Person
                           ' to the new teacher record thus avoiding dups
                           ' and fills in LNAME, FNAME, TP, LAST_CHG etc.
            NewTID = !TID
            .Update   ' ---------------------------- ADD NEW TEACHER RECORD
            .MoveFirst    ' go to the new record!
            .FindFirst "TID = " & NewTID
            .Edit
            tempTP = IIf(IsNull(!TP), "", !TP)
            Call setFieldTP(tempTP, "ET") ' ADD ET if seleced one in list
            !TP = tempTP
            .Update
          End If
          .MoveFirst    ' go to the new record!
          .FindFirst "TID = " & NewTID
          .Edit
          !Temp = "PCol " & Format(Now, "mm/yy")  ' <----- Teacher TEMP
          !LAST_CHG = Format(Now, "mm/dd/yy")     '  <--- Persons LAST_CHG
          !SCH_CODE = Me.SCH_CODE   ' could be set to null if user not enter
                                   'school before Teacher.
          .Update
          Me.cbTeacher.Value = !TID
       End With
       Me.cbTeacher.Requery
       If NewPID = 0 And InStr(1, newdata, ";") <= 0 _
                 And FixedName = False Then
         Response = acDataErrAdded
       Else
          ' If I set Response = acDataErrAdded in this case, (forced a new record)
          ' combobox .value and me.STID(or TID etc) are reset to the value
          ' that was selected in the combobox prior to me forcing a new STID or TID.
          ' I think the acdataerrAdded puts this in there before it trys to
          ' exit the box..
          ' by settin Response = acDataErrContinue the new record is added,
          ' the correct record is selected in the combo box and the user just
          ' has to press enter or tab again or click somewhere else.
          ' perhaps the is a way to do this better but I know not this took two
          ' days to figure out! If do all this, combobox_BeforeUpdate is not called.
         DoCrLf = True
         TimerOption = 1
         Me.TimerInterval = 50   ' in 50 milliseconds do a crlf for the user
         Response = acDataErrContinue
       End If
     Else  ' abort the process, user abort
       Response = acDataErrContinue
       Me.cbTeacher = Null
       Exit Sub
     End If  ' user response to add record
   End If 'parsename rtn check
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Delete(Cancel As Integer)
   On Error GoTo SubError
   msg = "Deletes Record(s) in Tables ExhibitData, ExhibitStudents" & vbCrLf & _
         "and ExhibitJudges for Exhibit number " & Me.EXN & vbCrLf & _
         "DELETE EXHIBIT & JUDGE ASSIGNMENTS (if any)?"
   If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title) = vbNo Then
      Cancel = True
      Exit Sub
   End If
   DeleteEXN = Me.EXN
   deleteSTID = Me.ES_STID  ' Save These in case wish to delete Student and Person
   DeletePID = Me.S_PID
   Dim test As Integer
   test = Me.F_ORD
   
   Set ExhibitJudgesRS = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset _
                                      ("ExhibitJudges", dbOpenDynaset)
   With ExhibitJudgesRS
     .FindFirst "EXN = " & DeleteEXN
     If Not .NoMatch Then
        msg = "Exhibit " & DeleteEXN & " has Assigned Judges!" & vbCrLf & _
              "CONTINUE WITH DELETE?"
        If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title) = vbNo Then
          .Close
          Cancel = True
          Exit Sub
        End If
     End If
     .Close
   End With
   DidDelete = True
   Cancel = False  'rev 5.2.4 attempt to fix delete problems (not necessary set to false on enter sub)
   tS_FN = IIf(IsNull(Me.S_FN), "", Me.S_FN) ' save for logging
   tS_LN = IIf(IsNull(Me.S_LN), "", Me.S_LN)
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_BeforeDelConfirm(Cancel As Integer, Response As Integer)
   On Error GoTo SubError
   ' do not display the confirmation, did in on delete
   Response = acDataErrContinue
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox "FrmBefDelConfirm " & Err.Description
   End Sub
Private Sub Form_AfterDelConfirm(STATUS As Integer)
  ' Use this to delete other related records (i.e. Persons) BUT,
  ' You must do :me.Application.SetOption "Confirm RecordChanges",True
  '   Or this Routine is NEVER CALLED!
  ' Have to delete the ExhibitData record and the other ExhibitStudents
  ' records (F_ORD > 1) if any
  Dim test As Long
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Call ScifairLog("Del Exhibit (" & UserInitials & ") EXN: ", _
                           DeleteEXN, " " & tS_LN & ", " & tS_FN)
  Set ExhibitJudgesRS = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset _
                                      ("ExhibitJudges", dbOpenDynaset)
  ' when get here user has agreed to delet judges and the exhibit
  ' AND...   ExhibitStudent with F_ORD = 1 has Already been deleted from the table
  '  NO turning back now MUST DELETE THE EXHIBIT
  With ExhibitJudgesRS   ' delete all judge assignements
     .FindFirst "EXN = " & DeleteEXN
     Do While Not .NoMatch And Not .EOF
        test = !EXN
        .Delete
        .FindNext "EXN = " & DeleteEXN
     Loop
     .Close
  End With
  ' ExhibitStudents Student for F_ORD = 1 is already deleted, this does the others
  Stud2STID = 0
  Stud3STID = 0
  ' Delete the links to students in ExhibitStudent table
  With ExhibitStudentsRS
     .FindFirst "EXN = " & DeleteEXN
     Do While Not .NoMatch And Not .EOF
        test = !EXN
        If !F_ORD = 2 Then  ' save for later  student delete
          Stud2STID = !STID
        End If
        If !F_ORD = 3 Then   ' save for later student delete
          Stud3STID = !STID
        End If
        .Delete                 '   DELETE THE STUDENT EXHIBIT RECORD
        .FindNext "EXN = " & DeleteEXN
     Loop
     
  End With
  Set ExhibitDataRS = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset _
                                      ("ExhibitData", dbOpenDynaset)
  With ExhibitDataRS
      .FindFirst "EXN = " & DeleteEXN
      If Not .NoMatch Then
        .Delete
      End If
      .Close
  End With
  ' This Added to delete the Students and Persons.
  Call DeleteStud
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox "FrmSfterDelConfirm" & Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub DeleteStud()
  ' Deletes student1 using deleteSTID (already set) for Studnum1, and checks if stud2 or 3 to delete
  Dim studnum As Integer
  Dim errornum As Integer
  Dim substr As String
  On Error GoTo studerror
  If deleteSTID = 0 Or IsNull(deleteSTID) Then
    substr = " ('Removed' from Displayed Exhibit)"
  Else
    substr = " (Note: Deleted Exhibit no longer displayed)"
  End If
  For studnum = 1 To 3
     errornum = 0
     If studnum = 1 Then
       If deleteSTID = 0 Then  ' Skip first if just removed team student 2 or 3
         GoTo nextstud
       End If
     End If
     If studnum = 2 Then
      If Stud2STID = 0 Then
        GoTo nextstud
      Else
        deleteSTID = Stud2STID
      End If
    End If
    If studnum = 3 Then
      If Stud3STID = 0 Then
        GoTo nextstud
      Else
        deleteSTID = Stud3STID
      End If
    End If
    With StudentsRS  '  Students + persons
      errornum = 1
      .FindFirst "STID = " & deleteSTID
      If Not .NoMatch Then
        If MsgBox(!LNAME & ", " & !FNAME & " " & !MI & " " & !SALUTATION & vbCrLf & _
                  "DELETE STUDENT AND PERSON FROM DATA BASE?", _
                vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title) = vbNo Then
               GoTo didOK       '
        Else  '  want to delete the student record and person record
          If MsgBox("ARE YOU SURE? (Ask the staff if in doubt)" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
           "  DELETE STUDENT & PERSON " & !LNAME & ", " & !FNAME & " " & _
          !MI & " " & !SALUTATION & " FROM DATA BASE?" & vbCrLf & _
           substr, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, _
          Title) = vbYes Then
            DeletePID = !PID
            Call ScifairLog(" Del E_Student" & studnum & " (" & _
                        UserInitials & ") STID: ", deleteSTID, _
                            " " & !LNAME & ", " & !FNAME)
            Call ScifairLog("  Del E_Person (" & UserInitials & ") PID: ", _
               DeletePID, " " & !LNAME & ", " & !FNAME)
            errornum = 2
            .Delete
            Set personsRS = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset("Persons", dbOpenDynaset)
            With personsRS
              errornum = 3
              .FindFirst "PID = " & DeletePID
              If Not .NoMatch Then
               errornum = 4
               .Delete
              End If
              .Close
            End With  'persons delete
          End If  ' if yes to second question , DELETE Stud and person
        End If  ' first time to ask if ok to delete
      End If  ' found a student to delete
      GoTo didOK ' got here with no errors
studerror:
      Dim texttemp As String
      Select Case errornum
      Case 1
           texttemp = "Find Student Error"
      Case 2
           texttemp = "Student probably in Protocols!"
      Case 3
           texttemp = "Find Person Error"
      Case 4
           texttemp = "Person in Other Table (Job)"
      Case Else
           texttemp = "Unknown Error"
      End Select
      errornum = Err.Number
      MsgBox texttemp & vbCrLf & Err.Description
      Err.Clear
didOK:
    End With
nextstud:
  Next studnum

End Sub

Private Sub Form_Load()
  On Error GoTo SubError
  ' This is Required If any Work is done in me.AfterDeleteConfirm_Click Action
  HoldCRCState = Me.Application.GetOption("Confirm Record Changes")
  Me.Application.SetOption "Confirm Record Changes", True
  DidDelete = False
  DeletePID = 0
  DidAdd = False
  Me.Rev.Caption = RevisionDate
  If InStr(1, CurrentDb.Name, "Slave") Then
     Me.MenuBar = "SciFairSlaveMenu"
     Me.Toolbar = "SciFairSlaveFormsTools"
  End If
  DoCrLf = False

  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Open(Cancel As Integer)
   ' Rev 2.3.3  233
     Set dbSciFair = CurrentDb()
     Set FairInfoRS = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset("FairInfo", dbOpenDynaset)
'                       , dbPessimistic) ' locks the record on .edit
     With FairInfoRS
       .FindFirst "FAIR_YEAR = " & FairYear()
       If .NoMatch Then
         MsgBox "Table FairInfo must have an entry for year " & FairYear() _
         & vbCrLf & "Fix this Problem before you Work with Exhibits!" _
         & vbCrLf & "Set Proper Fair Year, Do Fair Maintenance, or Call for Help!", , Title
         Cancel = 1
         Exit Sub
       Else
        If IsNull(!FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT) Then
          MsgBox "Table FairInfo must have a number (eg 100000) in" & vbCrLf & _
          "the FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT field." & vbCrLf & _
          "Fix this Problem before you Work with Exhibits!" _
         & vbCrLf & "Set Proper Fair Year, Do Fair Maintenance, " & vbCrLf & _
          "or place a number (100000 is suggested) in that field" & vbCrLf & _
          "in the record for fair year " & FairYear(), , Title
          Cancel = 1
          Exit Sub
        End If
        .FindNext "FAIR_YEAR = " & FairYear()
        If Not .NoMatch Then
           MsgBox "There are two or more records in FairInfo table for Fair Year " & FairYear() & vbCrLf & _
                  "You Must Delete one of the records before you Work with Exhibits"
           Cancel = 1
           Exit Sub
         End If
        End If
     End With
  ' This moved from Form_Load so cancel bails out
    On Error GoTo DoAgain
DoAgain:
  'UserInitials = "Click Cancel to Abort"
  UserInitials = InputBox("Please Enter Your Initials. (2 or 3 characters)" & vbCrLf & _
                "(Used in ActionLog (Deletions) Etc.)", Title, "    ")   ' Rev 2.3.3 233
  If IsNull(UserInitials) Or UserInitials = "" Then
      Cancel = 1
      Exit Sub
      'GoTo doagain
  End If
  
  If Len(UserInitials) > 3 Or Len(UserInitials) < 2 _
      Or UserInitials = " " Or UserInitials = "  " Or UserInitials = "   " Then GoTo DoAgain
  
  On Error GoTo SubError  ' for rest of code if any
  ' Open the Students , Teachers and Persons Tables
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Title = "Exhibits Edit"
  Set dbSciFair = CurrentDb()
    'Start Rev 2.3.1.  Feb 2006. Fix to try to remind people to set the fair year to the current year.  This only works
  ' if the first entry of exhibits is actually after january 1st of the year of the fair.
  ' better tests are probably possible but for now this will have to do
  '  Modification done Feb, 2006 by Dennis Spanogle
  
  Dim tempFY As String
  tempFY = Format(Date, "yyyy")
  If tempFY <> FairYear() Then  ' the actual year is not the same as FairYear() return
     If MsgBox("Are you entering data for Fair Year " & FairYear(), vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton1, _
               "Verify Fair Year") = vbNo Then
        If MsgBox("CAUTION: FairYear is set to " & FairYear() & " - NOT " & tempFY & "!" & vbCrLf & _
           "  You may be about to enter exhibit data for the wrong Fair Year! " & vbCrLf & _
           "  Do you want Change the Fair Year to " & tempFY & " for this copy of SciFairSlave or SciFairMaster?", vbYesNo, _
           "Verify FairYear versus Year of data entry") = vbYes Then
           CurrentDb().Properties("FairYear") = tempFY
           msg = "Fair Year has been changed to " & FairYear() & "."
           If InStr(1, CurrentDb.Name, "FairSlave") > 0 Then  ' SciFairSlave only, update the startupform new data
              Forms!StartUp!tbFairYear.SetFocus
              Forms!StartUp!tbFairYear.Requery
           End If
           MsgBox msg
        Else
            MsgBox "Caution: All Exhibit entries will be entered with FairYear fields" & vbCrLf & _
               " set to " & FairYear() & "!  If this is NOT WHAT YOU WANT, DO NOT ADD EXHIBITS!"
         End If
     End If
  End If
  '  End Rev 2.3.1.

  ' The next statements give a type mismatch error unless or until
  ' I fixed the priority of references in the Visual Basic Tools option.
  ' Sequence must be:
  ' Visual Basic for Applications
  ' Microsoft Access 9.0 Library
  ' Microsoft Office 9.0 Library
  ' OLE Automation
  ' Microsoft DAO 3.6 Obj Lib
  ' Microsoft Visual Basic of Application Extensibility 5.3
  '  Others as needed
  '
  criteria = "SELECT Teachers.TID, Teachers.SCH_CODE, " & _
     "Teachers.Temp, Teachers.Type, Teachers.PID, Persons.LAST_CHG, " & _
     "Persons.SALUTATION, Persons.TP, Persons.FNAME, " & _
     "Persons.MI, Persons.LNAME FROM Persons " & _
     "RIGHT JOIN Teachers ON Persons.PID = Teachers.PID " & _
     "ORDER BY LNAME, FNAME, MI;"
  Set TeachersRS = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
  criteria = "SELECT Students.STID, Students.LAST_FAIR, Students.SEX, Students.GRADE, " & _
     "Students.S_SCH, Students.Temp, Persons.LNAME, Persons.FNAME, " & _
     "Persons.MI, Persons.SALUTATION, Students.S_TID, Persons.LAST_CHG, " & _
     "Persons.TP, Students.PID " & _
     "FROM Persons RIGHT JOIN Students ON Persons.PID = Students.PID " & _
     "ORDER BY Persons.LNAME, Persons.FNAME, Persons.MI, Persons.SALUTATION;"
  Set StudentsRS = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
  criteria = "SELECT ExhibitStudents.FYR, ExhibitStudents.EXN, " & _
   "ExhibitStudents.STID, ExhibitStudents.F_ORD, " & _
   "Students.PID, Students.SEX, Students.GRADE, " & _
   "Students.SSN, Students.S_SCH, Students.S_TID, Students.Temp " & _
   "AS S_Temp, Persons.TP, Persons.FNAME, Persons.MI, Persons.LNAME, " & _
   "Persons.HOME_PHONE, Persons.ADDR1, Persons.ADDR2, Persons.CITY, " & _
   "Persons.STATE, Persons.ZIP, Persons.SALUTATION, Persons.LAST_CHG, " & _
   "Persons.EMAIL, Persons.Temp AS P_Temp " & _
   "FROM (Persons RIGHT JOIN Students ON Persons.PID = Students.PID) " & _
   "RIGHT JOIN ExhibitStudents ON Students.STID = ExhibitStudents.STID;"
  Set ExhibitStudentsRS = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
  Set JudgeTypeCategoriesRS = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset _
          ("JudgeTypeCategories", dbOpenSnapshot, dbReadOnly)
  Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox "Form Open" & Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Close()
   On Error GoTo SubError
   Me.Application.SetOption "Confirm Record Changes", HoldCRCState
   TeachersRS.Close
   StudentsRS.Close
   ExhibitStudentsRS.Close
   JudgeTypeCategoriesRS.Close
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox "FormClose" & Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub FLOOR_Exit(Cancel As Integer)
    On Error GoTo SubError
    If IsNull(Me.[FLOOR]) Then
      MsgBox "'Y' (Floor) or 'N' (Normal table) Required", , Title
      Cancel = True
      Exit Sub ' no need to check
    End If
    If Asc(Me.[FLOOR]) <> Asc(UCase(Me.[FLOOR])) Then ' do only not ucase
        Me.[FLOOR] = UCase(Me.[FLOOR])
    End If
    Exit Sub
SubError:
    MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub

Private Sub GRADE_AfterUpdate()
    On Error GoTo SubError
    DidGrade = True
    Me.LAST_CHG = Format(Now, "mm/dd/yy")
    Exit Sub
SubError:
    MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub





Private Sub PAID_Exit(Cancel As Integer)
    On Error GoTo SubError
    If IsNull(Me.[PAID]) Then Exit Sub ' no need to check
    If Asc(Me.[PAID]) <> Asc(UCase(Me.[PAID])) Then ' do only not ucase
        Me.[PAID] = UCase(Me.[PAID])
    End If
    Exit Sub
SubError:
    MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub S_TP_Exit(Cancel As Integer)
   On Error GoTo SubError
   tempTP = IIf(IsNull(Me.S_TP), "", Me.S_TP)
   Call setFieldTP(tempTP, "ES")
   Me.S_TP = tempTP
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub SEX_Exit(Cancel As Integer)
    On Error GoTo SubError
    If IsNull(Me.[SEX]) Then Exit Sub ' no need to check
    If Asc(Me.[SEX]) <> Asc(UCase(Me.[SEX])) Then ' do only not ucase
        Me.[SEX] = UCase(Me.[SEX])
    End If
    Exit Sub
SubError:
    MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub

Private Sub SHmPh_AfterUpdate()
    On Error GoTo SubError
    Me.LAST_CHG = Format(Now, "mm/dd/yy")
    Exit Sub
SubError:
    MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub

Private Sub SHmPh_Enter()
  On Error GoTo SubError
  If Mid(Me.SHmPh, 1, 5) = "(505)" Then
    Me.SHmPh.SelStart = 6
    Me.SHmPh.SelLength = 0
  Else
    If IsNull(Me.SHmPh) Then '  no entry
       Me.SHmPh = "(505) " & Me.SHmPh
       Me.SHmPh.SelStart = 6
       Me.SHmPh.SelLength = 0
    Else ' have entry but first is not 505
       Beep
       Me.SHmPh.SelStart = 0
       Me.SHmPh.SelLength = 0
    End If
  End If
    Exit Sub
SubError:
    MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub

Private Sub STATE_Exit(Cancel As Integer)
    On Error GoTo SubError
    If IsNull(Me.[STATE]) Then Exit Sub ' no need to check
    If StrComp(Me.[STATE], UCase(Me.[STATE]), 0) <> 0 Then ' Binary compare
        Me.[STATE] = UCase(Me.[STATE])   ' do only if not already ucase
    End If
    Exit Sub
SubError:
    MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub T_EMail_Enter()
    On Error GoTo SubError
  If IsNull(Me.T_EMail) Then  '  allow entry if blank
    Me.T_EMail.Locked = False
  Else
    Me.T_EMail.Locked = True  '  do not allow changes
  End If
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub T_TP_Exit(Cancel As Integer)
   On Error GoTo SubError
   tempTP = IIf(IsNull(Me.T_TP), "", Me.T_TP)
   Call setFieldTP(tempTP, "TH")
   Me.T_TP = tempTP
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnFirst_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
 ' MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnFirst_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnFirst_Click
    DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acFirst
    On Error Resume Next
    ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
Exit_btnFirst_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnFirst_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnFirst_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnPrev_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  'MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnPrev_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnPrev_Click
    DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acPrevious
    On Error Resume Next
    ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
Exit_btnPrev_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnPrev_Click:
    Dim errnum As Long
    errnum = Err.Number
    If Err.Number = 2105 Then  ' can not go to specified record
       errnum = Err.Number
       'Exit Sub
    End If
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnPrev_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnNext_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  'MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnNext_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnNext_Click
    If Me.CurrentRecord = Me.Recordset.RecordCount Then
       MsgBox "End of Data!"
       ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
       Exit Sub
    End If
    DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acNext   ' if try to renumber an exhibit to one that exists, get error here
    On Error Resume Next
    ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
Exit_btnNext_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnNext_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnNext_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnLast_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
 ' MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnLast_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnLast_Click
    DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acLast
    On Error Resume Next
    ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
Exit_btnLast_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnLast_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnLast_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnAdd_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnAdd_Click
    DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acNewRec
    Me.xExhibits_Edit__Student_2.Visible = False
    Me.xExhibits_Edit__Student_3.Visible = False
    Me.btnDelStud2.Visible = False
    Me.btnDelStud3.Visible = False
    On Error Resume Next
    Me.cbStudent.SetFocus
Exit_btnAdd_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnAdd_Click:
    Dim errnum As Long
    errnum = Err.Number
    If Err.Number = 2105 Then  ' gan not go to record some problem
      MsgBox "Can not Add Record Now"
      Exit Sub
    End If
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnAdd_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnDelete_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  'MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnDelete_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnDelete_Click
      DeleteLast = False
      If Me.Recordset.RecordCount = Me.CurrentRecord Then  'last record
        'Me.SEX.SetFocus ' get out of student box to avoid 'enterstudent' message
        DeleteLast = True
      End If
      DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acEditMenu, 8, , acMenuVer70  'Select Record
      DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acEditMenu, 6, , acMenuVer70  'Delete if return false then error
      If DeleteLast = True Then ' Stupid Bill Gates went to add new record - dumbshit
        'On Error Resume Next '
        'DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acEditMenu, acUndo, , acMenuVer70
        'On Error GoTo Err_btnDelete_Click
        DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acPrevious
        DeleteLast = False
      End If
      On Error Resume Next ' Skip all messages re not able to focus
      ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
Exit_btnDelete_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnDelete_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnDelete_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnSave_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
 ' MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnSave_Click()
    Dim SvEXN As Long
    On Error GoTo Err_btnSave_Click
    If IsNull(Me.ES_STID) Then
      MsgBox "Must Enter Student! (or Undo)", vbOKOnly, Title
      On Error Resume Next
      ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
      Exit Sub
    End If
    If IsNull(Me.EXN) Then
      MsgBox "No EXN! Did you clear the box? If not, Program error?"
      On Error Resume Next
      ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
      Exit Sub
    Else
      SvEXN = Me.EXN
    End If
    If InAdd Then
      DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acRecordsMenu, acSaveRecord, , acMenuVer70
    End If
    ' The next command does a Remove Filter Sort which in effect requeries
    DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acRecordsMenu, 3, , acMenuVer70 'RemFiltSort
    On Error Resume Next
    ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
    'Me.Requery
    Me.Recordset.FindFirst "EXN = " & SvEXN  ' Record set has only student 1
Exit_btnSave_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnSave_Click:
    Dim errnum As Long
    errnum = Err.Number
    If Err.Number = 2046 Or Err.Number = 2009 Then  ' command undo not available
       Exit Sub
    End If
    If Err.Number = 2105 Then ' can not go to specified record
      Exit Sub
    End If
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnSave_Click
End Sub

Private Sub TeamEx_BeforeUpdate(Cancel As Integer)
 ' rev 540
 '  can not uncheck if have more than one student in current form
 '
 If TeamEx.Value = False Then  '  Unchecking
    If TeamEx.OldValue = True Then
       If Me.xExhibits_Edit__Student_2.Visible Then
          MsgBox " You must delete team students first."
          Cancel = True
       End If
    End If
 Else   ' trying to check it
    If TeamEx.OldValue = False Then
       If Me.xExhibits_Edit__Student_2.Visible = False Then   '   no team students
       '  do nothing at this time
       
       End If
    End If
 End If

End Sub



Private Sub THmPh_Enter()
  On Error GoTo SubError
   If IsNull(Me.THmPh) Then  '   allow addition of phone number
     Me.THmPh.Locked = False
   Else
     Me.THmPh.Locked = True  '   Do not allow changes
   End If
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
